fd:scripts.fd:init: [{"script":{"content":"//fetch dispute details from ea and district\\nvar params = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);\\nvar actualData=JSON.parse(window.atob(params.get('input')));\\n//ea.value=actualData.ea;\\n//district.value=actualData.district;\\nvar jsonData={'ea':actualData.ea\,'district':actualData.district\,'InfoType':'Partial'\,'DRType' : actualData.type};\\n//console.log(jsonData); \\n$.ajax({ \\n\\t type: 'GET'\, \\n\\t contentType: 'application/json'\,\\n\\t url: window.location.protocol+\\"//\\"+window.location.hostname+\\":\\"+window.location.port+'/rest/services/Caltrans-eADR/Processes/GetDisputeMeetings'\,\\n \\t data : jsonData\,\\n\\t //dataType: \\"json\\"\,\\n\\t success: function (data) { \\n \\t//console.log(data);\\n //console.log(data.getElementsByTagName(\\"GetRowCount\\")[0].innerHTML);\\n count=parseInt(data.getElementsByTagName(\\"GetRowCount\\")[0].innerHTML);\\n if(count === 0){\\n DisTableNoDataRow1.visible = true;\\n }\\n if(count>0){\\n jsonResponse = JSON.parse(data.getElementsByTagName(\\"DRBMembersDetailsJson\\")[0].innerHTML);\\n //console.log(jsonResponse.Dispute_Meetings.Meeting.DISPUTE_MEETING_ID);\\n //console.log(data.Dispute_Meetings.Meeting.length);\\n \\tif(count===1){\\n \\tEADRDisputeTable.Row1.instanceManager.addInstance(1);\\n EADRDisputeTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances[0].table1_item1.value=jsonResponse.Dispute_Meetings.Meeting.DISPUTE_MEETING_ID;\\n EADRDisputeTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances[0].table1_item2.value=jsonResponse.Dispute_Meetings.Meeting.DISPUTE_CURRENT_STATUS;\\n EADRDisputeTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances[0].table1_item3.value=jsonResponse.Dispute_Meetings.Meeting.NAME;\\n if(jsonResponse.Dispute_Meetings.Meeting.CLOSED_DISPUTE_COMMENTS!==\\"null\\"){\\n EADRDisputeTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances[0].table1_item4.value=jsonResponse.Dispute_Meetings.Meeting.CLOSED_DISPUTE_COMMENTS; \\n }\\n else{\\n EADRDisputeTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances[0].table1_item4.value=\\"---\\"; \\n }\\n EADRDisputeTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances[0].visible=true;\\n \\t}\\n else{\\n for(var i=0; i<count; i++){ \\n EADRDisputeTable.Row1.instanceManager.addInstance(1);\\n EADRDisputeTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances[i].table1_item1.value=jsonResponse.Dispute_Meetings.Meeting[i].DISPUTE_MEETING_ID;\\n EADRDisputeTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances[i].table1_item2.value=jsonResponse.Dispute_Meetings.Meeting[i].DISPUTE_CURRENT_STATUS;\\n EADRDisputeTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances[i].table1_item3.value=jsonResponse.Dispute_Meetings.Meeting[i].NAME;\\n if(jsonResponse.Dispute_Meetings.Meeting[i].CLOSED_DISPUTE_COMMENTS!==\\"null\\"){\\n EADRDisputeTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances[i].table1_item4.value=jsonResponse.Dispute_Meetings.Meeting[i].CLOSED_DISPUTE_COMMENTS; \\n }\\n \\t else{\\n \\tEADRDisputeTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances[i].table1_item4.value=\\"---\\"; \\n }\\n EADRDisputeTable.Row1.instanceManager.instances[i].visible=true;\\n } \\n } \\n }\\n\\t }\,\\n\\t error: function(err){\\n\\t\\talert(\\"something went wrong\\");\\n\\t }\\n});"\,"event":"Initialize"\,"field":"guide.guideRootPanel.SummaryPanelEst.disputeMeeting"}\,"nodeName":"SCRIPTMODEL"\,"version":1\,"enabled":true}]

fd:scripts.fd:init:
[{"script":{"content":"//fetch progress meeting details from ea and district\\nvar params = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);\\nvar actualData=JSON.parse(window.atob(params.get('input')));\\n//console.log(actualData);\\nea.value=actualData.ea;\\ndistrict.value=actualData.district;\\nvar jsonData={'ea':ea.value\,'district':district.value};\\nxmlData = OBJtoXML1({\\"data\\":jsonData});\\n//console.log(jsonData);\\n$.ajax({ \\n type: 'POST'\,\\n headers: {\\n 'Content-Type' : 'application/xml'\,\\n 'Accept' : '*/*'\\n }\,\\n url: 'http://'+window.location.hostname+':8080'+'/rest/services/Caltrans-eADR/Processes/GetProgressMeetingDetails'\,\\n data: xmlData\,\\n success: function (data) { \\n count=parseInt(data.getElementsByTagName(\\"GetRowCount\\")[0].innerHTML);\\n if(count>0){\\n jsonResponse = JSON.parse(data.getElementsByTagName(\\"PMDetailsJson\\")[0].innerHTML);\\n if(count===1){ \\n ProgressMeetPartial.Row1.instanceManager.addInstance(1);\\n ProgressMeetPartial.Row1.instanceManager.instances[0].table1_item1.value=\\"

\\"+jsonResponse.Progress_Meetings.Record.PROGRESS_MEETING_ID+\\"

\\";\\n ProgressMeetPartial.Row1.instanceManager.instances[0].table1_item2.value=\\"

\\"+jsonResponse.Progress_Meetings.Record.PROGRESS_MEETING_DATE+\\"

\\";\\n ProgressMeetPartial.Row1.instanceManager.instances[0].table1_item3.value=\\"

\\"+jsonResponse.Progress_Meetings.Record.CHAIR_ADVISOR_REPORT+\\"

\\";\\n ProgressMeetPartial.Row1.instanceManager.instances[0].table1_item4.value=jsonResponse.Progress_Meetings.Record.RE_RESPONSE;\\n ProgressMeetPartial.Row1.instanceManager.instances[0].table1_item5.value=jsonResponse.Progress_Meetings.Record.CONTRACTOR_RESPONSE;\\n ProgressMeetPartial.Row1.instanceManager.instances[0].table1_item6.value=jsonResponse.Progress_Meetings.Record.FINAL_STATUS;\\n ProgressMeetPartial.Row1.instanceManager.instances[0].visible=true;\\n }\\n else{\\n for(var i=0; i\\"+jsonResponse.Progress_Meetings.Record[i].PROGRESS_MEETING_ID+\\"

\\";\\n ProgressMeetPartial.Row1.instanceManager.instances[i].table1_item2.value=\\"

\\"+jsonResponse.Progress_Meetings.Record[i].PROGRESS_MEETING_DATE+\\"

\\";\\n ProgressMeetPartial.Row1.instanceManager.instances[i].table1_item3.value=\\"

\\"+jsonResponse.Progress_Meetings.Record[i].CHAIR_ADVISOR_REPORT+\\"

\\";\\n ProgressMeetPartial.Row1.instanceManager.instances[i].table1_item4.value=jsonResponse.Progress_Meetings.Record[i].RE_RESPONSE;\\n ProgressMeetPartial.Row1.instanceManager.instances[i].table1_item5.value=jsonResponse.Progress_Meetings.Record[i].CONTRACTOR_RESPONSE;\\n ProgressMeetPartial.Row1.instanceManager.instances[i].table1_item6.value=jsonResponse.Progress_Meetings.Record[i].FINAL_STATUS;\\n ProgressMeetPartial.Row1.instanceManager.instances[i].visible=true;\\n }\\n }\\n }\\n }\,\\n error: function(err){\\n alert(\\"something went wrong\\");\\n }\\n});"\,"event":"Initialize"\,"field":"guide.guideRootPanel.SummaryPanelEst.progressMeeting"}\,"nodeName":"SCRIPTMODEL"\,"version":1\,"enabled":false}]
